const AuthService={saveSession(userData){sessionStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(userData));sessionStorage.setItem('isAuthenticated','true');},getCurrentUser(){try{const userStr=sessionStorage.getItem('user');return userStr?JSON.parse(userStr):null;}catch(error){console.error('Error al obtener usuario:',error);return null;}},isAuthenticated(){return sessionStorage.getItem('isAuthenticated')==='true';},hasRole(role){const user=this.getCurrentUser();return user&&user.role===role;},logout(){sessionStorage.clear();window.location.href='/';}};// ✅ EXPORTACIÓN PARA REACT
export default AuthService;
